response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are confident this price reflects both the value of the product and provides you with a great opportunity to acquire something truly exceptional. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 11000}
